snippet: The automaker is recalling more than 300,000 2011-12 Sonatas because the transmission can be moved out of park without pressing the brake pedal.
abstract: Hyundai announces recall of more than 300,000 Sonatas due to potential problem with braking system; recall, which applies to Sonata models manufactured from 2011-12, is Hyundai's third recall since 2009 for malfunctioning brake switch.
lead_paragraph: The automaker is recalling more than 300,000 2011-12 Sonatas because the transmission can be moved out of park without pressing the brake pedal.

headline.main: Hyundai Cars Are Recalled Over Faulty Brake Switch
headline.print_headline: Hyundai Cars Are Recalled to Repair Brake Switch
